p: Results: Figure 30 shows calculation of M1 (overall alarm duration reduction = 31 %) and M2 (artifact alarm duration reduction = 94 %) The number of artifact alarms in the complete data set is estimated from artifact prevalence in the annotated sample. Figure 31 is the ROC diagram for ML algorithm for both short and long alarms. The vertical line indicates proportion of artifact alarms correctly identified at a false negative rate of 30 % (i.e. % of real alerts incorrectly filtered out).
